top.title: Typhoon Kalmaegi hits Vietnam after killing at least 114 in Philippines
top.summary: More than 260,000 soldiers are on standby for rescue efforts as winds of up to 92mph (149km/h) hit Vietnam.

top.title: Russian soldier sentenced to life in jail in unprecedented Ukrainian trial
top.summary: In the first ruling of its kind, Dmitry Kurashov was found guilty of killing an unarmed Ukrainian soldier who had surrendered.

top.title: Sudan's RSF militia says it agrees to humanitarian ceasefire
top.summary: The group issued the statement after an 18-month siege of the city of el-Fasher in the western Darfur region.

top.title: Grand Theft Auto studio accused of 'union busting' after sacking workers
top.summary: A union representing people in the gaming sector said 31 people were fired at Rockstar's UK studios.

top.title: 'Vibe coding' named word of the year by Collins Dictionary
top.summary: The art of making an app by describing it to artificial intelligence (AI) tops 10 new terms on the shortlist.

top.title: Will quantum be bigger than AI?
top.summary: The highly-complex technology is increasingly being tipped to transform computing.

title.#text: FBI subpoenas the web registrar behind Archive.is
You can now make your own Wordle puzzles
